categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Sometime after the mission to Shu-Torun, General Carlist Rieekan assigned the smuggler Han Solo and Princess Leia Organa a mission to travel to Lanz Carpo in the Core Worlds and convince the Galactic Empire of collusion between the Carpo Crime Syndicate and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
